subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dwight Lowery knows he developed a crisis of confidence last season, but he insists it was as much due to the behavior of the coaching staff as to being an N.F.L. rookie.
snippet: Dwight Lowery knows he developed a crisis of confidence last season, but he insists it was as much due to the behavior of the coaching staff as to being an N.F.L. rookie.
